mapper.sql: id, user_id, name, gender, position, telephone, wechat_num, qq_num, " create_date", modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into user_info (id, user_id, name, gender, position, telephone, wechat_num, qq_num, " create_date", modify_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechatNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

user_id,

gender,

wechat_num,

modify_date,

mapper.update:
update user_info
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat_num = #{wechatNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq_num = #{qqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
" create_date" = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_num = #{wechatNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq_num = #{qqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, " create_date" = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
